We are the roast club... (a.k.a. Papa Roast)

Hey! We are Sam and Martha, two bumbling idiots who love potatoes and gravy. Sam loves gravy the most. He drinks it, bathes in it, waters his flowers with it, and even does his laundry with it. Martha on the other hand is nuts for potatoes. There isn't anything potato-related that Martha doesnt like, be it new potatoes, dauphinoise potatoes, Mr. Potato Head, Spud-nik, or a raw potato sandwich. Anyway, I digress... Enjoy the Roast Club.

We will judge you and your roast. We will not hold back!

Not only will we judge it, we will scorn it. We will tear your pathetic attempt at a roast dinner to shreds and then we will eat it shred by shred until we have a bowl of shreddies like your nanna knitted. Then we will have if for breakfast the next day with a glass of smooth Tropicana.
